sentences.sContent: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.
sentences.sCn: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.sContent: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.sCn: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

sentences.sContent: ...Did you enjoy your stay with us...
...but to enjoy the beautiful scenery of Mount Huang...
...the Chinese food you have brought me is delicious and I enjoy it so much...
...It is not convincing if you say you have chosen the subject because you enjoy it...
...if you can’t enjoy the music at a sensible volume...
...I seldom had time to enjoy my hobby...
...typically enjoy higher valuations in the stock market...
...I really enjoy that piece you just played on the piano...
...They tend to enjoy the moment when something good is happening...
...A recent Harris poll revealed that 79% of Americans say they enjoy cooking and 30% "love it" ; 14% admit to not enjoying kitchen work and just 7% won't go near the stove at all...

synos.tran: 欣赏，享受；喜爱；使过得快活

words.tran: 愉快地；有趣地；可享乐地
